page.title: 17HOUSING IN SEAHAM.
page.content: MUCH OF THE RESIDENTAL AREAS OF SEAHAM IS TAKEN UP BY THE OLDER FASHIONED TYPE OF COLLIERY TERRACED HOUSE.IN DAWDON,SEAHAM HARBOUR AND NORTHLEA THESE HOUSES SPRING OUT FROM THE COLLIERIES IN LONG ROWS.THEY ARE VERY OLD HOUSES BUT ARE STILL EXTREMELY STURDY AND MANY PEOPLE HAVE MADE MARVELOUS MODERNISATIONS.THERE ARE MANY ESTATES OF COUNCIL HOUSES,THE MOST MODERN AND SOUGHT AFTER BEING IN NORTHLEA ESTATE.BECAUSE SEAHAM IS SURROUNDED BY A "GREEN BELT" ON THREE SIDES,MORE HOUSING ESTATES ARE SPRINGING UP ON THE OUTSKIRTS.AT DALDEN HEIGHTS PEOPLE HAVE HAD HOUSES DESIGNED TO THEIR OWN SPECIFICATIONS AND HAVE DONE MUCH OF THE BUILDING THEMSELVES OR WITH THE HELP OF FRIENDS.IT IS PROPOSED TO HAVE MORE OF THESE HOUSES TO THE EAST AND SOUTH OF SEAHAM.
